title: Episode #75 - Al Madrigal & ME
description: Stand up comedian, actor, host, producer, & Co-Founder of All Things Comedy, Al Madrigal sits in the Mancave w/ me & talks about working in San Fran w/ Hedberg, Chappelle, firing people, keeping busy, and the art of SHRIMPING.
